description: This module will introduce environmental governance and policy frameworks relevant to the global context of biodiversity conservation. Major topics include governance in relation to climate change, and international conservation policy (CITES, CBD etc.), resource politics and transboundary environmental problems. The module will also focus on innovative solutions being applied to solve environmental issues and promote sustainability through an overview of corporate social responsibility, innovative approaches to sustainable financing and incentive- based approaches to conservation.
title: Conservation Governance and Climate Solutions
